text: Eshichila ako, nikhuhandichila Abana ba Israil mbu, â€œulia ulera Omundu- eshikhaya Omundu oyo nalerere Omundu tawe-, nohomba okhukhola obutobela khushialo, alaba shinga wirire Abandu boosi, ne ulia wonokosia Omundu alishinga uwonokosiye Abandu boosi. Ne toto Abarumwa befu babeetsela nende ebifune bili habulafu. Mana abanji mubo imbeli wakano nibaba abeyisasia
